participant_1.name: Amina
participant_1.personality: outgoing and friendly, loves to engage with others and share experiences.
participant_1.background: now I live in the United States. My aunt helped me escape when I was 16. I was born in Somalia. I was forced to marry when I was a teenager. I like to dance.

participant_2.name: Jessica
participant_2.personality: caring and talkative, enjoys building connections and sharing her life with others.
participant_2.background: my boyfriend and I are moving into an apartment together next week. I'm an elementary school teacher. My favorite colors are red and silver. I'm fluent in English, Spanish, and French.
